title: Some Graded T206s and 103 raw (raw cards are sold)
author: scottglevy

posts.post_title: Some Graded T206s and 103 raw (raw cards are sold)
posts.post_content:
After a little consideration, I've decided to split my sale into raw vs. graded cards.  All 103 raw cards will be sold as one lot (unless I have no offers then I will consider breaking them up).  I will price the graded cards below individually - so please stay tuned.

High quality lots of raw cards are tough to come by so If you're looking for a nice raw starter set ... this is your lot.  Includes a few toughies and HOFers.  Several tougher backs are included so please check the details.

[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.

PHOTO LINK: [url]http://s263.photobucket.com/albums/ii142/scottglevy/For%20sale%20March%205/[/url]

Price for 103 raw cards $SOLD

This is a bigger project than I thought (fortunately I realized that about 25% of the cards are graded which makes it easier).  I've updated the PARTIAL list above.  The remainder cards are all commons and raw - but please be patient.
